Excellence
Who We Are

Empowering Farmers with Next-Gen Solutions

Harishree Crop Science is a premier manufacturer of agricultural inputs, dedicated to enhancing crop productivity and soil health.

We specialize in developing high-performance bio-fertilizers, organic pesticides, and plant growth regulators. Our products are the result of rigorous research and a deep understanding of Indian farming conditions, ensuring that every farmer gets the best yield with minimal environmental impact.

2+

Years Experience

50+

Products

1000+

Happy Farmers

20+

Regions Served

Our Vision

To be the global leader in sustainable agricultural innovation, creating a world where farming is profitable, eco-friendly, and capable of feeding the future.

Our Mission

To engineer superior crop protection capability and deliver high-quality, cost-effective agricultural solutions that empower the farming community.

Quality Policy

"We are committed to total customer satisfaction by providing high-quality agricultural inputs ensuring on-time delivery and continual improvement in our processes and products."

Why Choose Us

The Harishree Advantage

Premium Quality

ISO 9001:2015 certified manufacturing processes ensure superior product efficacy.

3

Solutions focused on maximizing farmer profitability and crop health.

4

Eco-Friendly

Safe for the environment, beneficial for the crops.

Meet Our Visionaries

Vishal Dobariya

Founder & CEO

Director of Operations

Expert in agricultural innovation and supply chain management. Ensuring the seamless delivery of premium bio-fertilizers to farmers across the nation.

Director of R&D

Leading strategic initiatives in eco-friendly pesticides. Specialized in product development and quality assurance to enhance farm productivity.

Our History

A Decade of Growth

2024

Seeds of Innovation

Founded with a vision to revolutionize Indian agriculture through sustainable solutions.

2024

R&D Excellence

Established a state-of-the-art research facility to develop proprietary crop protection formulas.

2025

Global Footprint

Expanded operations to international markets, exporting quality agro-chemicals.

2025

Green Revolution 2.0

Launched a comprehensive range of eco-friendly bio-fertilizers and organic pesticides.

Leading manufacturer of agricultural products committed to sustainable farming solutions and environmental stewardship. Empowering farmers with quality inputs for a better harvest.
